other_tests.findings: Preoperative PTH level was 344 pg/ml; decreased to 60.7 pg/ml post-resection.
other_tests.changes_over_time: PTH levels decreased significantly after adenoma resection, indicating successful removal.

other_tests.findings: A 1.1-cm hypoechoic mass at the inferior margin of the lower pole of the left thyroid.

other_tests.procedure_name: Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the abdomen
other_tests.findings: Diffuse enlargement and edema of the pancreas with small amounts of peripancreatic stranding and fluid consistent with acute pancreatitis.
